title: Alembic Pharma appoints Gopal Rangaraj as CIO & Head-IT
text: #Alembic Pharmaceuticals Alembic Pharma appoints Gopal Rangaraj as CIO & Head-IT Rangaraj will lead the 108-year-old drug manufacturer into the new era of disruptive technologies. Sneha Jha | 19 October 2015, 8:05 AM IST Follow ETCIO Vadodara- based drug maker Alembic Pharmaceuticals has appointed Gopal Rangaraj as the CIO & Head-IT of the company.Rangaraj will be responsible for leading the various IT initiatives of the pharma company. He will architect a roadmap for new technology interventions including digitization of processes, deployment of new information security initiatives and creating infrastructure for data analytics. Rangaraj will lead the organization into the new era of disruptive technologies.Established in 1907, Alembic Pharmaceuticals is spread over 75 countries and is one of the most integrated and robust pharmaceutical companies across the globe.Rangaraj will operate out of Vadodara, the corporate headquarters of the company.Prior to this role, Ranagaraj held the position of Senior Vice President-IT at Reliance Life Sciences, the biotechnology initiative of Reliance Industries.During his eight year stint with the company, Rangaraj orchestrated the digitization of supply chain processes. He was instrumental in deploying mobile CRM for improving customer engagement and spearheaded a number of quality control and quality assurance automation projects. He was also built a Sharepoint- based intranet portal for improving employee collaboration and engagement.
